content:
Spingold/Goldfaden family

1 Aron GOLDFADEN                     1755 - 1818 #200 {census family 490}
 + Dine                              1750 - 1818 #135 (Mayer)
  2x Abraham Aron SPINGOLD           1775-78 - 1831 #130 {census family 491}
    + Elia Ester PIASECKI            1777-80
     3o Hana Feigel SPINGOLD         1797
       * Abram Jakob EINTRACHT       1795
             married Oct 25, 1813 #29
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Hirsch SPINGOLD              1801
       + Feigel KUPFERLICH           1804 (Lazar)
        4o Chaja SPINGOLD            1822 #327
        4x Jakob Juda SPINGOLD       1825 #95 - 1827 #253
        4o Rywka SPINGOLD            1827 #166
        4x Zelig SPINGOLD            - 1832 #107
        4x Moyzesz SPINGOLD          1833 #377
        4o Ester SPINGOLD            1836 #542
     3o Beile SPINGOLD               1803-04 - May 13, 1807 Krakow
     3o Nachel Chaja SPINGOLD        Sep 21, 1810 #15
       * Jozef FOGELSINGER           1808
             married 1827 #69
        4o Reice FOGELSINGER         1829 #205
     3o Sara SPINGOLD                1812 #129 - 1846 #433
       * Zelig PERLBERG              1811-12 Czyzyny Krakow - Sep 8, 1881 #435
             married 1833 #84
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Szeindel SPINGOLD            1813 #118 - ?1832 #150
     3o Mary SPINGOLD                Apr 1815 - Feb 2, 1816 #45a
     3o Kreindel SPINGOLD            1817 - 1818 #58
     3x Izaak Leib SPINGOLD          1818 #86
       + Rifka KORNGOLD              1816 - 1847 #763 (Abraham+Rachel)
        4x Abraham Kalman SPINGOLD   Oct 6, 1845 #511
       + Rifka HERSZLOWICZ 
        4x Aron Herszel SPINGOLD     1851 #209 - Dec 20, 1881 #617
       + Anna
     3o Dyne SPINGOLD                1820 #161 - 1820 #109
     3x Aron SPINGOLD                1821 #327 - 1822 #90
     3o Chawa Jutel SPINGOLD         1823 #378 - 1824 #42
     3o Hades SPINGOLD               1826 #65
 + Breindel                          c1753 - 1823 #249




        Mordchy GOLDFADEN
       + Chana Bluma 
        4x Rafal GOLDFADEN           1830 Rzeszow - after 1900
          + Rachel BECK              ?1829 #251 - after 1900
                married Apr 29, 1855 (1878 #45)
           5o Basche GOLDFADEN       May 2, 1857 #845
             * Chaim IMMERGLUCK      May 1855 Przegorzaly
                   married Oct 29, 1878 #46
                 FAMILY LISTING
           5x Abraham Dawid (Adolf) GOLDFADEN  Sep 14, 1859 #2098
           5x Markus GOLDFADEN       Oct 7, 1861 #157
           5o Gitel GOLDFADEN        Sep 6, 1864 (1865 #27)
           5o Maria GOLDFADEN        Sep 30, 1866 #712
           5x Lobel GOLDFADEN        Sep 6, 1869 #617 - after 1890
